e-com.title: E-commerce Website Development Project
e-com.detail: Development of an e-commerce website using PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript without using a framework, as I did not have knowledge of frameworks at that time. The website can handle user authentication, product management, shopping cart system, and order processing effectively.

mytask.title: Internal Project Management System Development
mytask.detail: Development of an internal project management system that helps improve collaboration by creating and tracking projects, assigning tasks, defining user roles, and updating information in real-time. Used Vue.js, Nuxt 3, Vuetify for Frontend and Node.js for Backend.
